name: refined-mapy.cz
description: Refines Mapy.cz interface and adds useful features
author: Pavel 'Strajk' Dolecek <strajk@me.com> (https://www.strajk.me/)

map-condensed.title: Condensed Map interface
map-condensed.description: Redundant controls hidden, the rest made more compact and unified. Hidden hefty text descriptions. Hidden paid Points of interest.

performance.title: Performance improvements

shortcuts.title: Keyboard shortcuts
shortcuts.description:
Keyboard shortcuts for fast map type switching (<kbd>Q</kbd> Basic, <kbd>W</kbd> Outdoor, <kbd>E</kbd> Aerial, <kbd>R</kbd> Geographic)

<kbd>P</kbd> toggle Pano, <kbd>O</kbd> toggle 3D

<kbd>1-9</kbd> set zoom levels
